aztecs.description:
**Infantry and Monk civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Villagers carry +5
:small_blue_diamond:Military units created 10% faster
:small_blue_diamond:+5 Monk hit points for each Monastery technology
:small_blue_diamond:Start with +50 gold

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Jaguar Warrior (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Atlatl (Skirmishers +1 attack, +1 range)
:small_blue_diamond:Garland Wars (+4 infantry attack)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Relics generate +33% gold

**Tech Tree:**

berbers.description:
**Cavalry and Naval civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Villagers move 10% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Stable units cost -15% in Castle, -20% in Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Ships move 10% faster

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Camel Archer (cavalry archer), Genitour (mounted skirmisher)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Kasbah (team castles work 25% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Maghrebi Camels (Camel units regenerate)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Genitour available in the Archery Range starting in the Castle Age

**Tech Tree:**

britons.description:
**Foot Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Town Centers cost -50% wood in Castle Age
:small_blue_diamond:Foot archers (except skirmishers) have +1 range Castle Age, +1 range Imperial Age (for +2 total)
:small_blue_diamond:Shepherds work 25% faster

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Longbowman (archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Yeomen (+1 foot archer range +2 tower attack)
:small_blue_diamond:Warwolf (Trebuchets do blast damage)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Archery Ranges work 20% faster

**Tech Tree:**

bulgarians.description:
**Infantry and Cavalry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Militia-line upgrades free
:small_blue_diamond:Town Centers cost -50% stone
:small_blue_diamond:Can build Krepost

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Konnik (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Stirrups (Cavalry attack 25% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Bagains (Militia-line gains +5 armor)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Blacksmiths work 50% faster

**Tech Tree:**

burmese.description:
**Monk and Elephant civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Lumber Camp upgrades free
:small_blue_diamond:Infantry +1 attack per age (starting in the Feudal Age)
:small_blue_diamond:Monastery techs cost -50%

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Arambai (ranged cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Howdah (Battle Elephants +1/+1P armor)
:small_blue_diamond:Manipur Cavalry (Cavalry and Arambai +6 attack vs. buildings)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Relics visible on the map at the start of the game

**Tech Tree:**

byzantines.description:
**Defensive civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Buildings +10% HPs Dark, +20% Feudal, +30% Castle, +40% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Camel Riders, Skirmishers, Pikemen, Halberdiers cost -25%
:small_blue_diamond:Fire ships attack 20% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Advance to Imperial Age costs -33%
:small_blue_diamond:Town Watch free

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Cataphract (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Greek Fire (Fire Ships +1 range)
:small_blue_diamond:Logistica (Cataphracts cause trample damage)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Monks +50% heal speed

**Tech Tree:**

celts.description:
**Infantry and Siege civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Infantry move 15% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Lumberjacks work 15% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Siege weapons fire 20% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Sheep not converted if in 1 Celt unit's line of sight

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Woad Raider (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Stronghold (Castles and towers fire 20% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Furor Celtica (Siege Workshop units +40% HP)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Siege Workshops work 20% faster

**Tech Tree:**

chinese.description:
**Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Start with +3 villagers, -50 wood, -200 food
:small_blue_diamond:Technologies cost -10% Feudal, -15% Castle, -20% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Town Centers support 10 population and +5 LOS
:small_blue_diamond:Demolition ships +50% hit points

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Chu Ko Nu (archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Great Wall (Walls and towers +30% HP)
:small_blue_diamond:Rocketry (Chu Ko Nu +2, scorpions +4 attack)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Farms +45 food

**Tech Tree:**

cumans.description:
**Cavalry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Additional Town Center can be built in the Feudal Age
:small_blue_diamond:Siege Workshop and Battering Ram available in the Feudal Age; Capped Ram upgrade available in Castle Age
:small_blue_diamond:â€¢ Cavalry 5% faster each age (starting in Feudal Age)

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Kipchak (cavalry archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Steppe Husbandry (Light Cavalry, Steppe Lancers and Cavalry Archers trained 50% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Cuman Mercenaries (team members can create 10 free Elite Kipchaks in the Castle)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Palisade Walls +50% HP

**Tech Tree:**

ethiopians.description:
**Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Archers fire 15% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Receive +100 gold, +100 food when advancing to the next age
:small_blue_diamond:Pikeman upgrade free

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Shotel Warrior (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Royal Heirs (Shotel Warriors train nearly instantly)
:small_blue_diamond:Torsion Engines (increases blast radius of Siege Workshop units)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Towers and Outposts +3 LOS

**Tech Tree:**

franks.description:
**Cavalry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Castles cost -25%
:small_blue_diamond:Cavalry +20% hit points starting in Feudal Age
:small_blue_diamond:Farm upgrades free (require Mill)
:small_blue_diamond:Foragers work 25% faster

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Throwing Axeman (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Chivalry (Stables work 40% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Bearded Axe (+1 Throwing Axemen range)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Knights +2 line of sight

**Tech Tree:**

goths.description:
**Infantry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Infantry cost -20% in Dark, -25% in Feudal, -30% in Castle, -35% in Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Infantry +1 attack vs. buildings per age (starting from Feudal Age)
:small_blue_diamond:Villagers +5 attack vs. wild boar; hunters carry +15 meat
:small_blue_diamond:Loom free
:small_blue_diamond:+10 population in Imperial Age

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Huskarl (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Anarchy (create Huskarls at Barracks)
:small_blue_diamond:Perfusion (Barracks work 100% faster)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Barracks work 20% faster

**Tech Tree:**

huns.description:
**Cavalry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Do not need houses, but start with -100 wood
:small_blue_diamond:Cavalry Archers cost -10% Castle, -20% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Trebuchets +30% accuracy

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Tarkan (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Marauders (Create Tarkans at stables)
:small_blue_diamond:Atheism (+100 years Relic, Wonder victories, Spies/Treason costs -50%)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Stables work 20% faster

**Tech Tree:**

incas.description:
**Infantry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Start with a free Llama
:small_blue_diamond:Villagers affected by Blacksmith upgrades
:small_blue_diamond:Houses support 10 population
:small_blue_diamond:Buildings cost -15% stone

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Kamayuk (infantry), Slinger (archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Andean Sling (Skirmishers and Slingers no minimum range)
:small_blue_diamond:Fabric Shields (Kamayuks, Slingers, Eagles +1/+2P armor)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Farms built 50% faster

**Tech Tree:**

indians.description:
**Camel and Gunpowder civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Villagers cost -10% Dark, -15% Feudal, -20% Castle, -25% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Fishermen work 10% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Camel Riders +1P armor

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Elephant Archer (cavalry archer), Imperial Camel Rider (camel rider)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Sultans (All gold income 10% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Shatagni (Hand Cannoneers +1 range)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Camel units +5 attack vs. buildings

**Tech Tree:**

italians.description:
**Archer and Naval civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Advancing to the next age costs -15%
:small_blue_diamond:Dock technologies cost -50%
:small_blue_diamond:Fishing Ships cost -15%
:small_blue_diamond:Gunpowder units cost -20%

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Genoese Crossbowman (archer), Condottiero (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Pavise (foot archers and Condottieri +1 armor/+1 pierce armor)
:small_blue_diamond:Silk Road (trade units cost -50%)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Condottiero available in the Barracks in Imperial Age

**Tech Tree:**

japanese.description:
**Infantry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Fishing Ships 2x hit points; +2P armor; work rate +5% Dark, +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Mill, Lumber/Mining Camps cost -50%
:small_blue_diamond:Infantry attack 25% faster starting in Feudal Age

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Samurai (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Yasama (Towers shoot extra arrows)
:small_blue_diamond:Kataparuto (Trebuchets fire, pack faster)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Galleys +50% line of sight

**Tech Tree:**

khmer.description:
**Siege and Elephant civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:No buildings required to advance to the next age or to unlock other buildings
:small_blue_diamond:Farmers don't require Mills/Town Centers to drop off food
:small_blue_diamond:Battle Elephants move 15% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Villagers can garrison in Houses

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Ballista Elephant (mounted scorpion)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Tusk Swords (Battle Elephants +3 attack)
:small_blue_diamond:Double Crossbow (Ballista Elephants and Scorpions fire two projectiles)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Scorpions +1 range

**Tech Tree:**

koreans.description:
**Defensive and Naval civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Villagers +3 line of sight
:small_blue_diamond:Stone miners work 20% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Tower upgrades free (Bombard Tower requires Chemistry)
:small_blue_diamond:Tower range +1 Castle, +2 Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Military units (except siege weapons) cost -20% wood

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:War Wagon (cavalry archer), Turtle Ship (war ship)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Panokseon (Turtle Ships move 15% faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Shinkichon (Mangonel-line +1 range)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Mangonel-line minimum range reduced

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Scorpions +1 range

**Tech Tree:**

lithuanians.description:
**Cavalry and Monk civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Start with +150 food
:small_blue_diamond:Spearman-line and Skirmishers move 10% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Each garrisoned relic gives +1 attack to Knights and Leitis (maximum +4)

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Leitis (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Hill Forts (Town Centers +3 range)
:small_blue_diamond:Tower Shields (Spearman-line and Skirmishers +2P armor)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Monasteries work 20% faster

**Tech Tree:**

magyars.description:
**Cavalry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Villagers kill wolves with 1 strike
:small_blue_diamond:Forging, Iron Casting, Blast Furnace free
:small_blue_diamond:Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar cost -15%

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Magyar Huszar (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Corvinian Army (Magyar Huszars cost no gold)
:small_blue_diamond:Recurve Bow (Cavalry archers +1 range, +1 attack)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Foot archers +2 LOS

**Tech Tree:**

malay.description:
**Naval civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Advancing to the next age 66% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Fish Traps cost -33%
:small_blue_diamond:Fish Traps provide unlimited food
:small_blue_diamond:Battle Elephants 30% cheaper

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Karambit Warrior (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Thalassocracy (upgrades Docks to Harbors, which fire arrows)
:small_blue_diamond:Forced Levy (Militia-line gold cost is replaced by additional food cost)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Docks +100% LOS

**Tech Tree:**

malians.description:
**Infantry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Buildings cost -15% wood
:small_blue_diamond:Barracks units +1P armor per age (starting from Feudal Age)
:small_blue_diamond:Gold Mining free

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Gbeto (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Tigui (Town Centers fire arrows when ungarrisoned)
:small_blue_diamond:Farimba (Cavalry +5 attack)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Universities work 80% faster

**Tech Tree:**

mayans.description:
**Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Start with +1 villager, but -50 food
:small_blue_diamond:Resources last 15% longer
:small_blue_diamond:Archers cost -10% Feudal, -20% Castle, -30% Imperial Age

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Plumed Archer (archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Obsidian Arrows (Archers, Crossbowmen and Arbalesters +6 attack vs. buildings)
:small_blue_diamond:El Dorado (Eagle Warriors have +40 hit points)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Walls cost -50%

**Tech Tree:**

mongols.description:
**Cavalry Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Cavalry archers fire 20% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Light Cavalry, Hussars, Steppe Lancers +30% hit points
:small_blue_diamond:Hunters work 40% faster

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Mangudai (cavalry archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Nomads (lost houses do not decrease population headroom)
:small_blue_diamond:Drill (Siege Workshop units move 50% faster)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar +2 line of sight

**Tech Tree:**

persians.description:
**Cavalry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Start with +50 wood, food
:small_blue_diamond:Town Center, Dock 2x hit points; work rate +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:War Elephant (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Kamandaran (Archer-line gold cost is replaced by additional wood cost)
:small_blue_diamond:Mahouts (War Elephants 30% faster)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Knights +2 attack vs. Archers

**Tech Tree:**

portuguese.description:
**Naval and Gunpowder civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:All units cost -20% gold
:small_blue_diamond:Ships +10% HP
:small_blue_diamond:Can build Feitoria in Imperial Age

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Organ Gun (siege), Caravel (war ship)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Carrack (Ships +1/+1 armor)
:small_blue_diamond:Arquebus (gunpowder units more accurate)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Line of sight is shared with the team starting in the Dark Age

**Tech Tree:**

saracens.description:
**Camel and Naval civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Market trade cost only 5%
:small_blue_diamond:Market costs -100 wood
:small_blue_diamond:Transport Ships 2x hit points, 2x carry capacity
:small_blue_diamond:Galleys attack 20% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Archers (except skirmishers) +1 attack vs. buildings per age (starting in the Feudal Age)

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Mameluke (camel rider)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Madrasah (Monks return 33% of their cost when killed)
:small_blue_diamond:Zealotry (Camel units +30 hit points)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Foot archers +1 attack vs. buildings

**Tech Tree:**

slavs.description:
**Infantry and Siege civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Farmers work 10% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Supplies free
:small_blue_diamond:Siege Workshop units 15% cheaper

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Boyar (cavalry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Orthodoxy (Monks +3/+3P armor)
:small_blue_diamond:Druzhina (Infantry damage adjacent units)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Military buildings provide +5 population room

**Tech Tree:**

spanish.description:
**Gunpowder and Monk civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Builders work 30% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Blacksmith upgrades don't cost gold
:small_blue_diamond:Cannon Galleons benefit from Ballistics (fire faster, more accurately)
:small_blue_diamond:Gunpowder units fire 15% faster

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Conquistador (mounted hand cannoneer), Missionary (mounted Monk)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Inquisition (Monks convert faster)
:small_blue_diamond:Supremacy (Villagers stronger in combat)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Trade units generate +25% gold

**Tech Tree:**

tatars.description:
**Cavalry Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Villagers gather +50% food from herdables
:small_blue_diamond:Units deal +25% damage when fighting from higher elevation
:small_blue_diamond:Thumb Ring, Parthian Tactics free

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Keshik (raiding cavalry), Flaming Camel (petard)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Silk Armor (Light Cavalry, Steppe Lancers and Cavalry Archers receive +1P armor)
:small_blue_diamond:Timurid Siegecraft (Trebuchets +2 range, enables Flaming Camels)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Cavalry Archers +2 LOS

**Tech Tree:**

teutons.description:
**Infantry civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Monks healing range 2x
:small_blue_diamond:Towers garrison 2x units
:small_blue_diamond:Murder Holes, Herbal Medicine free
:small_blue_diamond:Farms cost -40%
:small_blue_diamond:Town Center garrison +10
:small_blue_diamond:Barracks and Stable units have +1 armor Castle Age, +1 armor Imperial Age (for +2 total)

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Teutonic Knight (infantry)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Ironclad (siege weapons extra melee armor)
:small_blue_diamond:Crenellations (+3 range Castles, garrisoned infantry fire arrows)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Units resist conversion

**Tech Tree:**

turks.description:
**Gunpowder civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Gunpowder units +25% hit points; researching gunpowder technologies costs -50%; Chemistry free
:small_blue_diamond:Gold miners work 20% faster
:small_blue_diamond:Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrades free

**Unique Unit:**
:small_blue_diamond:Janissary (hand cannoneer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Sipahi (Cavalry Archers +20 HP)
:small_blue_diamond:Artillery (+2 range Bombard Towers, Bombard Cannons, Cannon Galleons)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Gunpowder units created 20% faster

**Tech Tree:**

vietnamese.description:
**Archer civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Enemy positions are revealed at the start of the game
:small_blue_diamond:Economic upgrades cost no wood
:small_blue_diamond:Archery Range units +20% HP
:small_blue_diamond:Conscription free

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Rattan Archer (foot archer)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Chatras (Battle Elephants +50 HP)
:small_blue_diamond:Paper Money (Each team member receives 500 gold)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Imperial Skirmisher upgrade available in the Imperial Age

**Tech Tree:**

vikings.description:
**Infantry and Naval civilization**

:small_blue_diamond:Warships cost -15% Feudal Age, -15% Castle Age, -20% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Infantry +10% hit points Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age
:small_blue_diamond:Wheelbarrow, Hand Cart free

**Unique Units:**
:small_blue_diamond:Berserk (infantry), Longboat (warship)

**Unique Techs:**
:small_blue_diamond:Chieftains (infantry deal bonus damage to cavalry)
:small_blue_diamond:Berserkergang (Berserks regenerate faster)

**Team Bonus:**
:small_blue_diamond:Docks cost -15%

**Tech Tree:**

footer.content: HOW TO USE: Click on any civilisation that you want to check from Civilisation Index and it will take you there. Under every civilisation there is a link to go back to Civ Index. Source Code: [adxy](https://test.com)
